scripts.dev: cd src/ && npm run build && cd .. && nw src/ --user-data-dir=../random-map-app-user-data/
scripts.prod-with-build: cd src/ && npm run build && cd .. && nwbuild --platforms osx64 --srcDir src/* --buildDir dist/* src/* --flavor normal --cacheDir cache/ --version 0.52.2
scripts.prod: nwbuild --platforms osx64 --srcDir src/ --buildDir dist/ src/ --flavor normal --cacheDir cache/ --version 0.52.2
